I remember that. BCH was also used as a payment method Though I believe in at least some of those cases, the reason behind this was volatile txfees plus lack of replace-by-fee support (for those transactions). Ethereum had mandatory RBF since day 1.
Also, this hasn't yet addressed the fact that ETH is the cheapest-to-use MoE in ethereum (and even more so for contracts!).

Also, ETH is the only medium of exchange on ethereum where the gas cost of transactions is 21000, and not ~40000. Abstraction would change this, but as I said, we have no active plans to do full abstraction.

The reason is that as of today, abstraction is not even implemented in ethereum. There are clear efficiency advantages to using ETH as a means of paying for gas: it's already baked into the protocol, zero gas cost to pay for gas (so no "tax tax"), network protocol supports it...
So I realized that the argument that "there's no value for ETH in ethereum as of today" is even wronger than I thought.

My 'A Killer Ecosystem' talk from #Devcon4 is now live on @SlidesLive. First speech on the Day 3 stream. Goes without saying that @ethereum went above and beyond in hosting an exceptional event in Prague. https://slideslive.com/38911572/devcon4-day-3
My 'Power of #Ethereum" keynote from @WebSummit in Lisbon yesterday is now live. It was too cool to see an entire CryptoConf stage dedicated to #blockchain speakers at such a massive event.

The @ConsensysDesign team recently released their Rimble Design System to the public! They've developed adaptable components and design standards to make #Ethereum more user friendly. Rimble aims to create common dApp UX patterns, built for developers. https://rimble.consensys.design/

The @uport_me app makes a portable and open identity system possible on #Ethereum. Send and request credentials, sign transactions, and securely manage keys & data from your phone. Dive into their modular components that were just open-sourced: https://github.com/uport-project/uport-mobile

The @C_Diligence team held a 'How To Not Get Rekt' workshop this week at #Devcon4, where experienced code auditors like @GNSPS gave hands-on advice to new smart contract devs. Teaching security best practices will be critical to maturing #Ethereum infrastructure.

You know them as the fleet of infrastructure tools that make #Ethereum development MUCH easier, but inside @ConsenSys we've affectionately nicknamed them 'TIM'. @trufflesuite, @infura_io, and @metamask_io are three of our oldest and most powerful dev resources.

Stop waiting for the #blockchain killer app, and start enjoying the killer ecosystem we have built around #Ethereum. #Devcon4 feels less like a conference, and more like a celebration of how far we have come. Honored to get the chance to speak about @ConsenSys, thanks @EFDevcon!

The @metamask_io mobile app was just announced at #Devcon4! Everyone's favorite #Ethereum browser extension is coming to your phone. The team is focusing on not being 'just a wallet', but a portal to the world of all things #blockchain. https://metamask.io/

The winged horse has taken flight! A huge congratulations to the @PegaSysEng team on releasing their open-source Java #Ethereum client, Pantheon. Developers, have at it: https://github.com/PegaSysEng/pantheon/

The @EntEthAlliance's newly released specifications and ongoing standards work are critical to accelerating #Ethereum business applications. Download a copy today, or learn more at their #Devcon4 booth! https://entethalliance.org/resources/

Announcing the @uport_me Developer Libraries v1.0! These new, user-centric dev tools make identity solutions easier than ever. All it takes is some simple javascript to make your #Ethereum dApp more trustworthy, flexible, and inclusive.

Super impressed by the new @3boxdb Profiles v1.0.0. Begin to establish your common identity on the #Ethereum blockchain, and share your profile across multiple dApps. The API then makes it easy for developers to read and update your profile! https://alpha.3box.io/
Congrats to @GetGitcoin and @kauri_io on being included in Wave IV of the @ethereum Grant Program! https://blog.ethereum.org/2018/10/15/ethereum-foundation-grants-update-wave-4/
With Spaces, @airswap continues to raise the UI/UX bar for #Ethereum dApps.

Sick of swiping? Keep an eye out for exciting news from the newest @ConsenSys spoke, @mojodating. A decentralized dating game, set in a virtual bar, and built on #Ethereum. @yunyun_chen, @awrigh01 & @pridesai want to rethink the 21st century relationship. https://www.mojodating.io/
My conversation with @MaierAstrid from @nextconf is now available to rewatch. 30 minutes about all things #blockchain, #Ethereum, and @ConsenSys.

The fantastic #Ethereum developer tools list has been updated with an ecosystem resources section by @corbpage, Japanese translation thanks to @sot528, and Korean translation courtesy of @sangphilkim. #BUIDL
A deep dive on oracles and #Ethereum by @ConsenSys very own John Adler. Scaling will make blockchains usable, but oracles will make them useful.

Looking forward to big things from @PegasysEng at Devcon4. Besides unveiling their new client Pantheon, don't miss the 2 day enterprise #Ethereum hackathon, co-sponsored by @EntEthAlliance and @Microsoft. Still time left to sign up and make the most of Prague #Blockchain Week 18'

I got to talk to the thousands of @strataconf attendees this morning about the power of @ethereum, and the excitement of building @ConsenSys. Thanks for having me @OReillyMedia. – at Jacob K. Javits Convention Center

ZCash has been quietly making progress . They have reduced transaction times from 45 seconds to 2,5 seconds and they have got approval from top regulators, including NYC. I caught up with @zooko at @ethereum Devcon.
Do you know what ETHEREUM 2.0 looks like? Check out our coverage of the @ETHEREUM Devcon in Prague. @VitalikButerin @VladZamfir @ErikVoorhees @zooko https://youtu.be/0HEyx39Id4s
I find this very funny. I mean this tweet is coming from the same people that forked Ethereum at their own discretion when they had an issue. No process, no governance protocol, nothing...
Is @ErikVoorhees convinced about Ethereum 2.0? check it out! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wdNWUQyouXM&t=313s

BANG!! Big show today! - @cz_binance how @binance stays on top! - @rogerkver takes sides on BCH - @VitalikButerin talks about Ethereum 2.0 - @gaborgurbacs Van Eck ETF is VERY close! - Crypto causes BIG waves in Marshall Islands!

Judging Ethereum today is like judging the internet in the days of dial up.We went from 5 mins to download a pic to streaming full movies. Surely anyone who was alive for both revolutions sees this? Vitalik says after the upgrades Ethereum may do 1m tps
